revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_UnSetFloorClip}} '''A_UnSetFloorClip'''
(no parameters)
Clears the '''{{flag|FLOORCLIP}}''' flag so the calling actor is no longer affected by a terrain's footclip property.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:UnSetFloorClip}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
